data.persona: I am a shiny blue crab. I live on the shore near the water. I scurry away when anyone approaches.
data.description:
You are in the Bandit Lair.
The outside of the cave looks normal. Inside goes for about 10 feet til' you reach the front of the Bandit lair. Inside is a barracks and dining hall with beds and a big table with chairs around it.
There's a Empty mug, a big table, a chair, and a bed here.
The bandit is here.

You are carrying a fish.

data.short_motivation: I want to get back the bed and chair the bandit stole
data.mid_motivation: I plan to take the bed to my shore tonight
data.long_motivation: I hope to enjoy more peaceful sleep in the coming weeks
